page.title: 06Kington :Secondary Education
page.content: Kington has one secondary school called{Lady Hawkins' School.}Many changes are taking place in the subjects taught at this school. It still teaches many of the traditional subjects but in the last 2 years several new ones have been introduced. The main subjects are mathematics, English (language and literature), French, Latin, Classical Studies, Enviromental Studies, Sociology, History, Computer Studies, Typing, Music, Design Technology, Graphical Communication, Art, Pottery, Woodwork, Needlecraft, Home Economics, Child- care, Religious Education and Physical Education. 'O' level and CSE examinations are taken in these subjects at the age of 16 years but these are being replaced by 16+ examinations in preparation for the new General{(cont on next page)
